Description: Painted pottery shabti of Hat, High Priest of Min and Revered Before Imsety with a black lappet-wig, a brown modelled face with white eyes and a red mouth, a red, yellow, blue and black collar and crossed arms in relief holding red hoes and the string of the yellow seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs upon a yellow ground; the remaining body is white.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
